categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Naq Med was a Force-sensitive human male who was trained in the ways of the Force as a Padawan in the Jedi Order by a Master. Sometime before the Clone Wars, he left the Order to pursue his own path. During this time, he met a female individual, and eventually the two had a daughter named J'Hara. Eventually, Med learned of Order 66 and the supposed Jedi uprising, believing the reports from Emperor Palpatine about the Order. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Med was tracked down by and fought the Grand Inquisitor, breaking the Inquisitor's lightsaber. Med survived and fled to Pam'ba, where he spent the rest of his life.

During the New Republic Era, Med was visited by his great-grandson, Karr Nuq Sin, and died knowing that he had protected his family and that the Jedi were no longer being hunted. After his death, Sin took Med's lightsaber and Jedi robes, and was inspired by his great-grandfather to become a Force collector, someone who not only collected items, but also to explain, remember and share the stories about the Jedi.
